H0.text: Conserving Earth's resources is one positive effect of recycling aluminum cans to manufacture new beverage containers.

H1.text: Creating acid rain is one positive effect of recycling aluminum cans to manufacture new beverage containers.

H2.text: Warming Earth's atmosphere is one positive effect of recycling aluminum cans to manufacture new beverage containers.

H3.text: Increasing the ozone layer is one positive effect of recycling aluminum cans to manufacture new beverage containers.

A4.text: It takes up to 95 percent less energy to recycle aluminium than to produce primary aluminium.

A5.text: Recycling aluminium takes up to 95 percent less energy, which also limits emissions, including greenhouse gases.
